scripts.build:android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.release:android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rm -rf ./android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rm -rf ./android/app/src/main/res/raw && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.build:ios: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios --dev false
